overview:
Pitchh.com is a high impact global business platform connecting brands and agencies across streams…advertising, public relations, marketing, below the line, allied service and more.

Pitchh was born out a simple insight that Brands and Agencies both require a platform that allows them to ‘make the right connect’ quickly and effectively.

You would agree that for brands the need today is ‘not’ necessarily about working with the largest, but the most appropriate partner; located anywhere in the world. This is further accentuated when it comes to specialized services such as research or social media. However, more often than not brands end up choosing from amongst the agencies they ‘know’ of, and worthy agencies, who could have, in fact, delivered better value never even get to know of the opportunity.

Using Pitchh

  • Brands & Organizations can reach out globally, seamlessly, in real time, for a wider choice of ideas and partners. Responses can be evaluated privately.

  • Agencies can use Pitchh for the critical business discovery function and apply for pitches by simply creating a profile. A profile also allows them to be found by clients via a listing on the site.

Also, given that a detailed template guides both brands and agencies to create the brief and responses, respectively, a higher quality interaction can be expected.
